languages.text: {n}Старуха наклоняется к вам, обдавая запахом чернил и свечного воска.{/n} "Скорбящий Сонм — уважаемый культ Бога-Императора. Адептус Министорум Простора нарекли их праведниками, борющимися с любого рода ересью, и призывают на разного рода... конфликты. Естественно, Экклезиархия не объявляет их своим воинством, но использует весьма схожим образом".

{n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха наклоняется к вам, обдавая запахом чернил и свечного воска.{/n} "Скорбящий Сонм — уважаемый культ Бога-Императора. Адептус Министорум Простора нарекли их праведниками, борющимися с любого рода ересью, и призывают на разного рода... конфликты. Естественно, Экклезиархия не объявляет их своим воинством, но использует весьма схожим образом".

traits.locale_text: {n}As the old woman leans toward you, you smell ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum have deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and have enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but is using them in very similar ways."

languages.text: {n}Als sich die Präfektin zu dir lehnt, nimmst du den Geruch von Tinte und Kerzenwachs wahr.{/n} "Der Traurige Gastgeber ist ein angesehener Kult des Gottimperators. Das Adeptus Ministorum bezeichnet seine Mitglieder als Vorbilder an Tugend, die jedwede Ketzerei bekämpfen und bereits in verschiedenen ... Konflikten geholfen haben. Natürlich zählt sie die Ekklesiarchie nicht zu ihren Kriegern, setzt sie aber auf sehr ähnliche Art und Weise ein."
languages.original_text: {n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sich die Präfektin zu dir lehnt, nimmst du den Geruch von Tinte und Kerzenwachs wahr.{/n} "Der Traurige Gastgeber ist ein angesehener Kult des Gottimperators. Das Adeptus Ministorum bezeichnet seine Mitglieder als Vorbilder an Tugend, die jedwede Ketzerei bekämpfen und bereits in verschiedenen ... Konflikten geholfen haben. Natürlich zählt sie die Ekklesiarchie nicht zu ihren Kriegern, setzt sie aber auf sehr ähnliche Art und Weise ein."

languages.text: {n}L'odeur de l'encre et de la cire de bougie parvient à vos narines lorsque la préfète se penche vers vous.{/n} « Le Concile des Affligés est une secte respectée qui vénère l'Empereur-Dieu. L'Adeptus Ministorum considère ses membres comme des parangons de vertu qui luttent contre toutes les formes d'hérésie et a fait appel à leur aide dans divers... conflits. Naturellement, l'Ecclésiarchie ne va pas jusqu'à les compter parmi ses guerriers, mais se sert d'eux de manières très similaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'odeur de l'encre et de la cire de bougie parvient à vos narines lorsque la préfète se penche vers vous.{/n} « Le Concile des Affligés est une secte respectée qui vénère l'Empereur-Dieu. L'Adeptus Ministorum considère ses membres comme des parangons de vertu qui luttent contre toutes les formes d'hérésie et a fait appel à leur aide dans divers... conflits. Naturellement, l'Ecclésiarchie ne va pas jusqu'à les compter parmi ses guerriers, mais se sert d'eux de manières très similaires. »

languages.text: {n}行政官朝你靠了过来，你闻到了一股墨水与蜡油混合的味道。{/n}“阴沉之主是一支崇拜神皇的教派，非常受人敬重。这支教派的信徒与各种各样的异端恶行抗争，国教教会将他们视为美德的楷模，会在各种各样的……冲突之中寻求他们的协助。当然，国教不会将他们视为正式成员，但他们的实际职责与正式成员没有太大区别。”
languages.original_text: {n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官朝你靠了过来，你闻到了一股墨水与蜡油混合的味道。{/n}“阴沉之主是一支崇拜神皇的教派，非常受人敬重。这支教派的信徒与各种各样的异端恶行抗争，国教教会将他们视为美德的楷模，会在各种各样的……冲突之中寻求他们的协助。当然，国教不会将他们视为正式成员，但他们的实际职责与正式成员没有太大区别。”

languages.text: {n}La prefecta se inclina hacia ti y el olor a tinta y cera llega a tu nariz.{/n} «La Hueste Dolosa es un culto respetado del Dios Emperador. El Adeptus Ministorum considera que son un ejemplo de virtud, grandes combatientes contra la herejía en todas sus formas y ha recurrido a su ayuda para diversos... conflictos. Naturalmente, la Eclesiarquía se abstiene de considerarlos sus guerreros, pero los emplea de forma muy similar».
languages.original_text: {n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta se inclina hacia ti y el olor a tinta y cera llega a tu nariz.{/n} «La Hueste Dolosa es un culto respetado del Dios Emperador. El Adeptus Ministorum considera que son un ejemplo de virtud, grandes combatientes contra la herejía en todas sus formas y ha recurrido a su ayuda para diversos... conflictos. Naturalmente, la Eclesiarquía se abstiene de considerarlos sus guerreros, pero los emplea de forma muy similar».

languages.text: {n}総監がこちらに身を乗り出すと、インクとロウソクの蝋の匂いがする。{/n}「ドールフル・ホストは、神帝陛下の尊敬を集める教団です。帝国宗務局は、彼らをあらゆる異端と闘う美徳の模範とみなし、さまざまな…紛争において彼らの助力を得てきました。当然ながら、帝国聖教会は彼らを戦士に数えることはしませんが、よく似た方法で彼らを利用しています」
languages.original_text: {n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}総監がこちらに身を乗り出すと、インクとロウソクの蝋の匂いがする。{/n}「ドールフル・ホストは、神帝陛下の尊敬を集める教団です。帝国宗務局は、彼らをあらゆる異端と闘う美徳の模範とみなし、さまざまな…紛争において彼らの助力を得てきました。当然ながら、帝国聖教会は彼らを戦士に数えることはしませんが、よく似た方法で彼らを利用しています」

languages.text: {n}Prefekt sana doğru eğilirken burnuna mürekkep ve mum kokusu geliyor.{/n} "Konakçı, saygın bir Tanrı İmparator tarikatıdır. Adeptus Ministorum, Konakçı'ya mensup kişileri her türlü kâfirlikte mücadele eden birer erdem timsali olarak görmüş ve çeşitli çatışmalarda yardımlarından faydalanmıştır. Doğal olarak Ekleşiarşi, her ne kadar onları kendi savaşçıları arasında saymaktan vazgeçse de pekâlâ benzer şekillerde kullanmaktadır."
languages.original_text: {n}As the prefect leans toward you, you get a whiff of ink and candlewax.{/n} "The Doleful Host is a respected cult of the God-Emperor. The Adeptus Ministorum has deemed them to be paragons of virtue who combat every manner of heresies, and has enlisted their aid in various... conflicts. Naturally, the Ecclesiarchy stops short of counting them among its warriors, but it uses them in very similar ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt sana doğru eğilirken burnuna mürekkep ve mum kokusu geliyor.{/n} "Konakçı, Tanrı İmparator'un saygın bir tarikatıdır. Adeptus Ministorum, Konakçı'ya mensup kişileri her türlü sapkınlıkla mücadele eden birer erdem timsali olarak görmüş ve çeşitli çatışmalarda yardımlarından faydalanmıştır. Doğal olarak Ekleşiarşi, onları kendi savaşçıları arasında saymaktan vazgeçse de pekâlâ benzer şekillerde kullanmaktadır."
